page.title: 08SOUTHWATER C.P.SCHOOL
page.content: THERE ARE 303 CHILDREN IN THE AGE RANGE OF 5/11.THERE ARE 11 CLASSES BUT THERE WILL BE 10 NEXT TERM.THE SCHOOL IS 17 YEARS OLD.NO FEES ARE PAID.THE SCHOOL STARTS AT 9.00 TO 3.30 OR 3.00 FOR THE INFANTS.LOTS OF MUMS HELP.THE HEADMISTRESS IS MRS.N.EELES. THE NEW SCHOOL WAS BUILT IN 1985 NEXT TO THE OLDER SCHOOL WHICH WAS BUILT IN 1969. IN THE CLASSES THE SUBJETS TAUGHT ARE MATHS,ENGLISH,TOPICS, CREATIVE WRITING, P.E.THERE ARE TEN FULL-TIME, ONE PART-TIME TEACHERS, ONE WELFARE ASSISTANT, ONE SECRETARY AND FIVE DINNER SUPERVISORS. WHEN THE CHILDREN LEAVE THEY GO TO MILLAIS (FOR GIRLS ), FOREST (FOR BOYS ) OR TANBRIDGE (WHICH IS MIXED ).
